channel.title: Got a PROBLEM with the 317 client, help please
channel.description:
ok so i downloaded EvolutionX Client+Source and everything is working fine but there is this problem i got, when im in game and i click to walk somewhere, the client closes. I'm using windows 7.
so please help me out guys :)

item.title: Got a PROBLEM with the 317 client, help please
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

In your client files there is an icon you click to make the client run, that is the icon you need to edit, right click edit. Open it with Notepad and paste it on Mopar.

Read full topic
item.source: Got a PROBLEM with the 317 client, help please

item.title: Got a PROBLEM with the 317 client, help please
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

I had this same problem. It’s something with the loading of the Java.

Normally clients are something like this

@echo off TITLE Client Java -Xmx500m EGUI pause

I replaced the Java with this

"C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe"

So it looks like this

@echo off TITLE Client "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe" -Xmx500m EGUI pause

And it should load fine and work =)

Read full topic
item.source: Got a PROBLEM with the 317 client, help please
